title: r/Prorevenge My Boss Fired Me, So I Destroyed His Company
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP is a high-ranking official at a company, but things take a turn for the worst when the company takes on a new CEO. OP realizes that the CEO is going to try to fire and replace him, so OP intentionally sabotages the company. Enjoy your multi-million dollar company while you can, because pretty soon you're going to be bankrupt! If you like this content, be sure to subscribe for more daily Reddit videos!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
